General.Name: Terran Orbital Corp
General.Description: Terran Orbital Corporation manufactures and sells satellites for aerospace and defense industry in the United States. It operates through two segments, Satellite Solutions and Earth Observation Solutions. The Satellite Solutions segment offers end-to-end satellite solutions, including spacecraft design, development, launch services, and on-orbit operations for critical missions across a range of applications in various orbits to governmental agencies and commercial businesses. The Earth Observation Solutions segment develops, builds, launches, and operates a constellation of earth observation satellites that has synthetic aperture radar capabilities to provide earth observation data and mission solutions. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida.
General.Address: 6800 Broken Sound Parkway NW, Boca Raton, FL, United States, 33487
